mapper.select: SELECT u.UserID, u.UserName, u.ProfileImg, a.TotalContribution FROM Users u JOIN ( SELECT UserID, SUM(ContributionCnt) AS TotalContribution FROM MeetingRoomMembers GROUP BY UserID ORDER BY TotalContribution DESC ) a ON u.UserID = a.UserID ORDER BY a.TotalContribution DESC

SELECT d.DepartmentID, d.DepartmentName, TopDepartments.DepartmentCount FROM Departments d JOIN ( SELECT DepartmentID, COUNT(*) AS DepartmentCount FROM MeetingRooms WHERE StageID = 6 GROUP BY DepartmentID ORDER BY DepartmentCount DESC ) AS TopDepartments ON d.DepartmentID = TopDepartments.DepartmentID ORDER BY TopDepartments.DepartmentCount DESC
